::KitKat::
She looked at Rowdy and Terrorsaur.  She turned and looked at 
Stringtra. "What now?  IF this pool got shallow all of a sudden?"  
her voice trailed off.

"A DOOR! BLAST! We're standing on the door. How else could the water 
have gone from deep to shallow in a few seconds.  That's a door. Next 
question is, how do we open it?"

She walked out into the inch deep water and tapped it with her paw.
